d: Huey is a zip-up hoodie with optional front pockets.

s.cutPocket.d: The **Pocket** (4) is not shown, but you can trace it from the Front part (1), which has the pocket outline on it (not including seam allowance).
s.cutCuff.d: The **Cuff** (7) is a rectangular piece of ribbing fabric {{{ w }}} wide and {{{ l }}} long.
s.cutWaistband.d: The **Waistband** (6) is a rectangular piece of ribbing fabric {{{ w }}} wide and {{{ l }}} long.
s.zipperLength.t: The maximum zipper length is {{ length }}
s.zipperLength.d: You need a zipper with a maximum length of {{ length }}. A slightly shorter zipper will work too.
s.ribbingYes.d: Include ribbing on sleeve and waistband

pocket.d: Whether to include a front pocket or not

pocketHeight.d: Controls the height of the pocket

hoodHeight.d: Controls the height of the hood

hoodCutback.d: Controls how far the hood opening is cut back

hoodClosure.d: Controls how much of the hood is part of the front closure

hoodDepth.d: Controls the depth of the hood

hoodAngle.d: Controls the angle at which the hood is attached

ribbing.d: Whether or not to include ribbing on the pattern.

ribbingHeight.d: Controls the height of the ribbing

ribbingStretch.d: Use this to adapt the pattern to how stretchy the ribbing that you are using is.

hipsEase.d: Controls the amount of ease at the hips

pocketWidth.d: Controls the width of the pocket
